summary: A documentary on 85-year-old sushi master Jiro Ono, his renowned Tokyo restaurant, and his relationship with his son and eventual heir, Yoshikazu.
cast: Jiro Ono|Yoshikazu Ono|Masuhiro Yamamoto|Daisuke Nakazama|Hachiro Mizutani|Harutaki Takahashi|Hiroki Fujita|Tsunenori Ida|Toichiro Iida|Akihiro Oyama|Shizuo Oyama|Hiroshi Okuda|Yukio Watanabe|Kazunori Kumakawa|Kazuo Fukaya|Syozo Someya|Hiromichi Honda
title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
